derivation: from G1909 (ἐπαγγέλλω) and the base of G32 (ἐπαγγέλλω);
strongs_def: to announce upon (reflexively), i.e. (by implication) to engage to do something, to assert something respecting oneself
outline:
1. to announce that one is about to do or furnish something
    1. to promise (of one's own accord) to engage voluntarily
  2. to profess
    1. an art, to profess one's skill in something
